Detailed Description

template<class DataConfig, class ActMechConfig>
class NeuronFactoryHelper< DataConfig, ActMechConfig >

Wrapper of real types of neuron configurators, used by NeuronFactory to create new neurons.

This class derives from a visitor that can be applied on the configurators to make a double dispatch and retrieve the right neuron type to create. The mechanism configurators are passed to the constructor of the factory and the method 'create' returns a pointer to a newly created neuron that is made with the given configurators.
